recommended_degree: Manajemen Perhotelan dan Pariwisata, Seni Kuliner dan Pengelolaan Jasa Makanan, Pendidikan Vokasional Seni Kuliner (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1.	Assists in the control of stocks, food preparation and other essential items needed for the production in the assigned section. 
2.	Supervises and participates in food preparation, coordinates kitchen personnel.
3.	Has knowledge of all aspects of cooking and is able to train subordinates in proper preparation and storage of food according to chef office standard recipes.
4.	Knowledge of safe operation of equipment and emergency procedures.
5.	Responsible for proper handling of all machines and equipments within the section.
6.	It is extremely important that he or she keep the working area inclusive the equipment hygienically clean at all the time.
7.	Responsible for preparing and processing all food items for use within the respective area with attention of minimum waste.
